sub_topic: Prove that the symmetric difference of two sets is distributive over union.
message_1: Let A = {1, 2, 3, 4} and B = {2, 4, 6, 8}. Find the symmetric difference of the sets A and B, and then find the union of the symmetric difference of A and B with set C = {3, 6, 9}. Finally, find the symmetric difference of the set union of A and B with set C. Verify whether the symmetric difference of the set union of A and B with C is distributive over union or not.
